title: The Best Of Clay and Buck - H3 - Jul 4 2022
itunes:title: The Best Of Clay and Buck - H3 - Jul 4 2022
description:
Biden falls off his bike on vacation when they had him all dressed up in workout gear to look competent. Even CBS pushes back on Biden's spending proposals: "Hiking taxes isn't gonna change the price of milk." Secretary of the Treasury Janet Yellen expects the economy to slow -- because it's been doing so well! Clay and Buck point out how wrong that statement is. Biden: There's nothing inevitable about a recession. "Regime" media, Washington Post, acknowledge the severity of baby formula shortage. Callers weigh in on CDC approving covid vaccines for children 6 months to 5 years old. CDC issues bizarre guidance for having sex with monkeypox. Buck says he can't even describe the graphics they used, but: "Rule 1 of libido when you have monkeypox is, let the monkeypox pass!"

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
